title: The Big red barn
creator_credit: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Joe Hayward, John Churchill and Robert Ennis
brief_description: Describes the daily life and activities of the domesticated animals of a farm that live together in the big red barn. Encourages creativity in oral and written expression, as the film is narrated in rhyming verse. Based on the story by Margaret Wise Brown. Suitable for lower primary level.
